message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your share loses value quickly, let's make a deal.  This is a better offer than you'll get in later rounds.
You're right, time is money. But I'm not desperate yet.
This is a fair offer considering the inflation. Let's settle this now before our shares shrink even more.
I'm willing to take the risk, are you?
This is my final offer.  A 50/50 split is the fairest I'm willing to go.  Take it or leave it, because I won't budge any further.
